tab1.text1:
Hi and Welcome to our small but humble community!


I hope you like it here and enjoy your stay.
tab1.text2:
- Keep chat English/Swedish

- Be respectful to other users both here and on Discord

- Please listen to mods

- Dont be a dick to people you dont know personally

- Dont be racist or, homophobic or sexist keep that to your friend group.

- If you see anything or notice anything dont hesitate to contact either Krognet or Shaull on discord, there is a link below
